vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly

LibRichErrors.rrevert uses assembly (LibSafeMath.sol#52-59)
	- LibSafeMath.sol#56-58

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in LibSafeMath.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (LibSafeMath.sol#21): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (LibSafeMath.sol#64): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.9 (LibSafeMath.sol#167): it allows old versions
